summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to advertise for sale negotiable bonds of the City of Seattle in the sum of $1,000,000 being half of the $2,000,000 voted at the general election held in the City of Seattle on the 8th day of March 1910, under and by virtue of Ordinance No. 22732, approved December 14, 1909, and declaring an emergency.
